name: al-shafi-platform
description: Al-Shafi Medical Platform - Complete Frontend + Backend Solution

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:myapp && npm run install:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:myapp
scripts.test: npm run test:myapp && npm run test:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:myapp && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:myapp: cd myapp && rm -rf node_modules .expo dist web-build
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules dist build

author: Al-Shafi Medical Team
